resources.string: Donâ€™t think about what to cook - in our application you can find interesting recipes for every day
Grilled salmon with vegetables and lemon is an exquisite dish that will surely please all fish lovers. Juicy salmon is prepared on the grill in combination with fresh vegetables and aromatic lemon.
Grilled salmon with spices and lemon
Tuna steak with lemon and soy sauce
Salmon with mashed potatoes and herb sauce
Shrimp fried with lemon and garlic
Mussels in creamy sauce with garlic and parsley
Tuna with orange glaze and grapefruit salad
Spicy tuna curry with coconut milk
Broccoli baked with Parmesan and spices. This simple and delicious dish makes an excellent side or appetizer.
Salad with cucumbers, tomatoes, and feta cheese. This salad enriches your lunch or dinner with fresh vegetables and tender cheese.
Potatoes baked with cheese and cream. This rich and hearty dish makes an excellent choice for dinner.
Traditional French ratatouille with vegetables. This vibrant and flavorful dish brings the authentic taste of France to your table.
Potatoes stuffed with vegetables and cheese. This tasty and hearty dish is prepared with minimal effort.
Fragrant rice cooked with vegetables and spices. This delicious dish is suitable as a side or main course.
Creamy spinach soup with potatoes. This soup makes an excellent start to your dinner.
Sweet potatoes baked with honey and cinnamon. This dessert is a perfect way to end your dinner.
Cauliflower with bacon and ranch dressing. This salad combines freshness and rich flavor.
Aromatic soup with pumpkin, ginger, and coconut milk. An ideal choice for the cold season.

Juicy beef steak, grilled with aromatic spices and herbs. This dish will surely delight meat lovers with its rich flavor and tender steak texture. The combination of spicy spices and aromatic herbs gives this steak a special twist.
Chicken wings cooked in BBQ sauce with a pleasant spiciness. This dish is perfect for parties and outdoor gatherings. Juicy and flavorful wings will delight all your guests.

Pork cutlet baked with honey-mustard sauce, balancing sweetness and spiciness. This dish combines the tenderness of pork with the unique flavors of honey and mustard. Perfect for special occasions and outdoor dinners.
Italian Carbonara dish prepared with salmon and creamy sauce. This dish is exceptionally tender and flavorful, with a rich creamy sauce. An excellent choice for special moments and outdoor dinners.
Juicy meat patties with a cheese filling. This dish is perfect for a festive dinner or a quick weekday meal. Juicy and flavorful, they will add variety to your table.
Homemade fried chicken nuggets. This is an American classic that will appeal to both children and adults. With a crispy coating and juicy meat, they are perfect for snacking.
Pork ribs baked in BBQ sauce. This dish features juicy and aromatic meat with a sweet and spicy glaze. Ideal for outdoor dinners and parties.
Spicy beef meatballs baked in tomato sauce. This dish combines the tenderness of meat with the aroma of tomato sauce and spices. Perfect for family dinners.
Roasted turkey with aromatic cranberry sauce. This dish is perfect for festive dinners and special occasions. The tender turkey meat and sweet cranberry sauce create a unique flavor combination.
Flavorful noodles with chicken and fresh vegetables. This dish combines tender chicken breast, crispy vegetables, and a flavorful sauce. It\'s perfect for quick and satisfying lunches or dinners.
Italian Carbonara dish prepared with salmon and creamy sauce. This dish is exceptionally tender and flavorful, with a rich creamy sauce. An excellent choice for special moments and outdoor dinners.
A delicious steak with a tender mushroom sauce is an excellent choice for meat lovers. Juicy meat and aromatic sauce create an unforgettable dish.
Baked chicken with seasonal vegetables is a great choice for a healthy dinner. Chicken protein and vitamins in vegetables make your dinner balanced and delicious.
Pork baked with apples and caramel sauce is an amazing combination of sweet and tender meat with tart apples. Perfect for festive dinners.
Beef marinated in teriyaki sauce and cooked to perfection. Perfect for lovers of juicy meat and Asian cuisine.
Fish fillet baked with lemon and herbs is a light and refreshing dish for those who care about their health. Fish is rich in protein and essential nutrients.
Classic Chicken Kiev cutlets with tender chicken mince and butter inside. This dish will delight all chicken lovers and leave no one indifferent.
Pork ribs baked with flavorful barbecue sauce. A dish with a rich taste and appetizing aroma, perfect for picnics and outdoor gatherings.
Appetizing pasta with meat sauce is a classic Italian dish that the whole family will enjoy. Juicy meat filling and aromatic spices will make your dinner unforgettable.
Pork cutlets are a simple and delicious meat dish. Tender pork meat with aromatic spices will please all meat enthusiasts.
Refreshing Greek pita light salad with cucumbers, tomatoes, and feta. It\'s perfect for a light lunch on a hot day.
Tuna salad with a mix of greens and olive oil. This meal is an excellent source of protein and healthy fats.
Chicken sandwich with avocado and spices. This dish combines a wonderful and rich flavor.
Vegetable omelette - a light and hearty lunch. Perfect for those who watch their figure.
Shrimp salad with avocado. This light lunch is rich in protein and healthy fats.
Quinoa with vegetables and greens - a perfect choice for vegetarians. Rich in protein and nutrients.
Turkey sandwich with red onion. This light lunch is rich in protein and low in calories.
Pasta with mushrooms and creamy sauce. This dish is perfect for lunch and combines a rich taste with a creamy sauce.
Traditional Hungarian goulash soup with meat and vegetables. This hearty and aromatic dish is perfect for a cold day.
Tuna vegetable salad with tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, and olive oil. This light lunch is rich in protein and low in calories.

1. Prepare the salmon fillet, season with salt and pepper to taste. Squeeze the lemon juice.\n2. Preheat the grill. Grill the salmon with vegetables until cooked, occasionally drizzling with lemon juice.\n3. Serve with the remaining lemon and seasonings to taste.
1. Prepare the salmon and season with spices. Ignite the grill and grill the salmon until cooked.\n2. Serve with lemon and garlic.
1. Prepare the tuna and season with soy sauce, garlic, and pepper. Sear in a pan until desired doneness.\n2. Serve with lemon and greens.
1. Prepare the salmon and pan-fry until done. Prepare mashed potatoes.\n2. Serve the salmon with mashed potatoes and a herb sauce.
1. Bake eel in teriyaki sauce with garlic and ginger until done.\n2. Serve sprinkled with herbs.
1. Fry the shrimp with garlic in olive oil until golden brown.\n2. Drizzle with lemon juice and sprinkle with parsley and pepper.

1. Heat a skillet, add garlic and sautÃ© until fragrant. Add mussels and cook until they open.\n2. Pour in white wine and add cream. Simmer until the sauce thickens.\n3. Serve, sprinkled with parsley.
1. Sear tuna until desired doneness. Prepare a glaze from orange juice, honey, and soy sauce.\n2. Mix oranges and grapefruits for the salad.\n3. Serve tuna with orange glaze on grapefruit salad.
1. Fry sardines with greens and lemon in olive oil until done.\n2. Serve, sprinkled with greens and seasoned to taste.

1. Sear tuna until golden brown. Set aside.
2. In the same pan, sautÃ© garlic and ginger. Add curry paste and sautÃ© a bit more.
3. Add coconut milk and vegetables. Simmer until done.
4. Serve curry with tuna pieces.
1. Cut broccoli into florets. Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with Parmesan and spices.\n2. Bake in a preheated oven until golden brown.\n3. Serve hot.
1. Dice cucumbers, tomatoes, onions, and feta cheese.\n2. Add olives and olive oil. Mix.\n3. Serve as a snack or side dish.

1. Slice potatoes thinly and mix with garlic and spices.
2. Pour cream over and sprinkle with cheese.
3. Bake until golden brown.
4. Serve hot.

1. Slice the vegetables into thin rounds.
2. SautÃ© them in tomato sauce with garlic and spices.
3. Cook until the vegetables are tender.
4. Serve as a side or main dish.

1. Prepare potato halves.
2. Fill them with tomatoes, feta cheese, and olives.
3. Bake until golden brown.
4. Serve as a side or appetizer.

1. SautÃ© onions and spices.
2. Add rice and cook until it becomes translucent.
3. Add vegetables and cook until tender.
4. Serve hot.

1. SautÃ© onions and potatoes.
2. Add spinach and cook until tender.
3. Puree the soup and add cream and spices.
4. Serve hot.
1. Cut sweet potatoes and mix with olive oil, honey, and cinnamon.\n2. Bake in the oven until tender.\n3. Serve hot as a side or dessert.

1. Boil cauliflower until tender.
2. SautÃ© bacon.
3. Mix cauliflower with bacon and ranch dressing.
4. Serve as a side or salad.

1. Dice pumpkin and sautÃ© with onions, garlic, and ginger.
2. Add coconut milk and simmer until tender.
3. Puree the soup and add spices.
4. Serve hot.
1. Prepare the beef steak and marinade with spices and herbs.\n2. Grill the steak to your desired level of doneness.\n3. Serve hot with seasonings.
1. Marinate chicken wings in BBQ sauce with paprika, garlic, and salt.\n2. Grill them until crispy.\n3. Serve hot with vegetables.
1. Marinate pork cutlet in honey-mustard sauce with garlic and salt.\n2. Bake until golden brown.\n3. Serve hot with a side dish.
1. Cook spaghetti.\n2. SautÃ© salmon in a pan, add cream, parmesan, egg, and garlic.\n3. Mix and combine with cooked spaghetti.
1. Prepare the ground meat, add onion, spices, and breadcrumbs.\n2. Form patties, placing a piece of cheese inside each.\n3. Fry until golden brown.
1. Coat chicken pieces in egg and breadcrumbs with spices.\n2. Fry until golden brown in vegetable oil.\n3. Serve with your favorite sauce.
1. Marinate pork ribs in BBQ sauce with spices, garlic, and salt.\n2. Bake until done in the oven.\n3. Serve hot with vegetables.
1. Mix ground beef with onion, spices, and salt, and form meatballs.\n2. Pour tomato sauce over them and bake in the oven.\n3. Serve hot.
1. Prepare the turkey, roast it with rosemary, garlic, and salt.\n2. Serve with cranberry sauce.
1. SautÃ© chicken breast and vegetables, add soy sauce.\n2. Cook noodles and combine with the other ingredients.\n3. Serve hot.
1. Cook spaghetti.\n2. SautÃ© salmon in a pan, add cream, parmesan, egg, and garlic.\n3. Mix and combine with cooked spaghetti.
1. Sear the steak in a pan to your desired level of doneness.\n2. Prepare a mushroom sauce with mushrooms, onion, garlic, and cream.\n3. Serve the steak with the mushroom sauce.
1. Prepare chicken breast and vegetables.\n2. Bake them in the oven until done.\n3. Serve hot as the main dish.
1. Prepare pork, slice apples.\n2. Bake pork with apples, drizzling with caramel sauce and spices.\n3. Serve hot.
1. Marinate beef in teriyaki sauce, garlic, and ginger.\n2. Sear the meat to your desired level of doneness.\n3. Serve with greens.
1. Prepare fish fillet, season with spices and garlic.\n2. Bake with lemon and herbs until done.\n3. Serve hot.
1. Form chicken mince into cutlets, hiding butter inside.\n2. Coat with breadcrumbs and fry until golden brown.\n3. Serve hot.
1. Marinate pork ribs in barbecue sauce, garlic, and spices.\n2. Bake until done in the oven or on the grill.\n3. Serve hot.
1. SautÃ© minced meat with onion and garlic, add tomatoes and spices.\n2. Cook spaghetti and combine them with the meat sauce.\n3. Serve hot.
1. Form pork cutlets, season with spices and coat with breadcrumbs.\n2. Fry until golden brown.\n3. Serve hot.
1. Chop cucumbers and tomatoes, mix with feta and herbs.\n2. Fill pita bread with the mixture and add olive oil.\n3. Roll up the pita and serve.
1. Sear the tuna in a pan until golden brown.\n2. Mix the mixed greens with olive oil, lemon juice, pepper, and salt.\n3. Place the tuna on the salad and serve.

1. Sear the chicken fillet until golden brown.
2. Mix mayonnaise, mustard, and spices for the sauce.
3. Assemble the sandwich: lettuce leaves, chicken fillet, avocado, and tomatoes. Drizzle with the sauce.
4. Serve with vegetable chips.
1. Beat eggs with milk.\n2. SautÃ© vegetables and herbs, then add eggs.\n3. Serve with cheese and tomatoes.

1. SautÃ© the shrimp in a pan with olive oil and lemon juice.\n2. Mix lettuce, avocado, and shrimp. Drizzle with a sauce made from olive oil, lemon juice, pepper, and salt.\n3. Serve as a light lunch.
1. Cook quinoa.\n2. SautÃ© vegetables and greens with spices.\n3. Mix with quinoa and serve.
1. SautÃ© the turkey in a pan with mustard, lemon juice, and spices.\n2. Assemble the sandwich: lettuce leaves, turkey, red onion. Drizzle with the sauce.\n3. Serve with vegetable chips.
1. Cook pasta.\n2. SautÃ© mushrooms and garlic in a pan, then add cream and cheese.\n3. Serve with pasta and garnish with parsley.
1. SautÃ© beef with onion and paprika.\n2. Add potatoes, tomatoes, and spices. Cook until the vegetables are tender.\n3. Serve hot with a piece of bread.
1. SautÃ© the tuna in a pan with olive oil.\n2. Mix mixed greens, tomatoes, cucumbers, and olives.\n3. Place the tuna on the salad and serve.
